name: Finisterra Labs / Baselight
description: Building a universal database for structured data - organizing the world's structured information. Making data accessible, searchable, and useful for everyone.

name: InterPlanetary Consensus (IPC)
description: Framework to scale blockchain networks with custom VMs and syscalls. Enables hierarchical consensus and cross-chain interoperability for Filecoin and beyond.

name: Abundance
description: Researching next-gen blockchain architecture (as of 2026) to achieve ultimate scalability in permissionless setting and fully resolve Blockchain Trilemma. May or may not succeed but must be fun.

name: Filecoin Indexing System
description: Core contributions to storetheindex and storethehash - the database system powering Filecoin's content routing and discovery infrastructure.

name: Go-f3
description: Golang implementation of the Fast Finality (F3) protocol for Filecoin, providing faster transaction finality and improved security guarantees.

name: Beyond Bitswap
description: Research initiative exploring improvements to file-exchange protocols in Filecoin and distributed systems, focusing on performance and efficiency.

name: ResNetLab
description: Platform for building resilient distributed systems through open, asynchronous collaboration on deep technical research problems.

name: TrustOS
description: Library, contracts and SDK for basic enterprite primitives for blockchain networks
